title: Silver Risk Monitor (SLV)
subtitle: Outcome first: regime, drivers, and what changes next.
regime_description: Extended, but intact: upside trend is still in place, but extension is elevated.
top_drivers: SLV remains materially above its 200D trend (extension elevated)
Shock conditions are still mostly quiet (no broad breakdown pattern)
Credit stress is stable, but not fully benign

escalate: If extension stays high and a shock trigger flips, BLUE can escalate to ORANGE
If HY spreads widen rapidly with weak SLV breadth, ORANGE/RED risk rises
deescalate: If extension cools while shock and credit remain quiet, BLUE can normalize to GREEN
If deterioration flags clear for multiple sessions, ORANGE can step back to BLUE

rules.definition: Trend positive-to-neutral, shock low, credit stress quiet.
rules.escalation: Extension score rises above ~70th percentile while other pillars remain stable.

rules.definition: Extended above trend, but no confirmed deterioration.
rules.escalation: Extension high + shock flips Watch OR credit starts widening.
rules.deescalation: Extension cools and deterioration flags remain off.

rules.definition: Extended + at least one deterioration pillar active.
rules.action_bias: Stop adding, trim rips, tighten risk
rules.escalation: Breakdown pattern: vol spike + down day cluster, drawdown breach, or credit stress jump.
rules.deescalation: Shock flags clear and price stabilizes across key moving averages.

rules.definition: Breakdown / stress regime with high shock and deeper drawdown.
rules.deescalation: Shock turns off and trend repair persists for multiple sessions.
